fields.description:
The KS tests with a camera overlay throw the below warning on open:
{code}
[WARN] :   Unbalanced calls to begin/end appearance transitions for <TiViewController: 0x15edd4900>.
{code}

*Steps to reproduce issue*:
1. Launch KS
2. Open the Phone > Camera section. Then open any of the following sections: Camera Custom Overlay, Camera Overlay Webview, Camera Augmented Reality.
3. Notice the above warning in the console

*Expected results*:
No Warning is shown
fields.summary: KitchenSink iOS: Camera with overlay throws warning
fields.environment:
Titanium SDK 4.0.0.v20150306095010
Studio 4.0.0.201502171827
CLI 3.4.2
Xcode 6.2
KitchenSink 3.5.2 (master as of date)

On: 
iPhone 6, iOS 8.2
iPad Air 2, iOS 8.2

comments.body: CR and FT passed. PR merged.

Verified fixed using:

Kitchen Sink 3.5.2 (master as of date)
MacOS 10.10.3
Studio 4.0.0.201504231645
Appc NPM 0.3.51
Appc CLI 0.2.273
Ti CLI 4.0.0-beta7
Node v0.10.37

Warning is no longer encountered.
